channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Should Former Tech Industry Employees Turn To Trade Jobs?
item.description: The CEO of the ‘world’s biggest recruiter’ appears to be suggesting this. But don’t believe the dystopian hype.

item.title: Buying a home is 150% more expensive than in 2019. But here’s why Trump’s plan to shut out institutional investors could raise costs even more
item.description: “Big investors have nothing to do with how the housing shortage got created,” says Ed Pinto, a leading housing expert.

item.title: Mastering Communication in 2026: The 3-Tier Framework Every Leader Needs
item.description: Communication is the smartest investment organizations can make to improve performance, culture, and leadership.

item.title: Google’s Recent Misstep Is a Warning for AI-Generated Medical Info

item.title: Is Powell’s Fed head independence dead? It’s just one more diversionary trick as Trump outfoxes himself

item.title: 30 Emotional Intelligence Quotes That Can Help Make Emotions Work for You, Instead of Against You
item.description: Emotions have power. These quotes illustrate the beauty of learning to harness that power.

item.title: Elon Musk says saving for retirement is irrelevant because AI is going to create a world of abundance: ‘It won’t matter’
item.description: Musk said a "supersonic tsunami" of AI and robotics will bring about a world of zero scarcity.

item.title: Sleeping Less Than This Amount Could Cut Years Off Your Life, Study Finds
item.description: Sleep has immediate payoff, but it also impacts life expectancy.
